alert.note: Alert for Laurel; Pulaski; Rockcastle; Wayne (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 2:42AM EDT until April 01 at 3:15AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Wayne County in south central Kentucky... Northwestern Laurel County in south central Kentucky... Pulaski County in south central Kentucky... Southern Rockcastle County in south central Kentucky... * Until 315 AM EDT. * At 242 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Naomi, or 11 miles west of Somerset, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Nancy around 245 AM EDT. Somerset Pulaski Airport around 250 AM EDT. Ruth around 255 AM EDT. Shopville around 300 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Billows and Wood Creek Lake. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
